mod.name: Replay The Spire
mod.credits:
Original creator of Replay: AstroPenguin642. 
 Artists: Bakuhaku, Stewartisme, Lyman, RedDyeNo5. 
 OST: Slimer509. 
 Translators: PJJLegend, TheGrobber, Rita-Bernstein, Rincewind. 
 Also helped: Reina, Blank the Evil.
mod.description: Huge content expansion mod. Adds new cards, relics, potions, events, monsters, and shenanigans.

cards.name: Run Through
cards.description: Target enemy loses 9 HP and 4 Block.

cards.name: Run Through+
cards.description: Target enemy loses 11 HP and 7 Block.

cards.name: Strike From Hell
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If this card is Exhausted, increase its damage by 4 and place it back into your hand.

cards.name: Strike From Hell+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If this card is Exhausted, increase its damage by 4 and place it back into your hand. It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Undeath's Touch
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage 2 times.
Apply 1 Decrepit.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Undeath's Touch+
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage 3 times.
Apply 1 Decrepit.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Abandon
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 3 cards.
Draw 1 card for each.
Add a Void to your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Abandon+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 3 cards.
Draw 1 card for each.
Add a Dazed to your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Corrosion Curse
cards.description:
Apply !replay:M-1! Languid and 2 Decrepit.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Corrosion Curse+
cards.description:
Apply !replay:M-1! Languid and 3 Decrepit.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Defy Death
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Costs [R] less for each card you've Exhausted this combat.
Grave.

cards.name: Defy Death+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Costs [R] less for each card you've Exhausted this combat.
Grave.

cards.name: Fire Breathing
cards.description: At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies, increasing damage by 1 each time.

cards.name: Fire Breathing+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies, increasing damage by 1 each time.

cards.name: Leading Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Reduce the cost of an Attack in your hand to 1 this turn.

cards.name: Leading Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Reduce the cost of an Attack in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Life Bind
cards.description: Apply to an enemy. When you lose health, the bound enemy takes that much damage.

cards.name: Life Bind+
cards.description: Apply to an enemy. When you lose health, the bound enemy takes that much damage.

cards.name: Limb From Limb
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage.
If this deals at least 30 unblocked damage, Refund 2 and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Limb From Limb+
cards.description:
Deal 28 damage.
If this deals at least 32 unblocked damage, Refund 2 and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Massacre
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Lose all Strength.
Affected 5 times by Strength.

cards.name: Massacre+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Lose all Strength.
Affected 8 times by Strength.

cards.name: Phantom Shield
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Phantom Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Reversal
cards.description:
Keep Block at the end of this round.
Gain 2 Reflection.

cards.name: Reversal+
cards.description:
Keep Block at the end of the next !replay:M-1! rounds.
Gain 3 Reflection.

cards.name: Weight Training
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Lose 2 HP.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Weight Training+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Lose 1 HP.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Demonic Infusion
cards.description:
Upgrade a Skill or Attack in your hand X times.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Demonic Infusion+
cards.description:
Upgrade a Skill or Attack in your hand X+ 1 times.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eclipse
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand, and replace it with random cards that cost 1 less than normal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eclipse+
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand, and replace it with random cards that cost 1 less than normal.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hemogenesis
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage. Gain 5 Block. Heal 5 HP. Exhaust.
Upgrade each time you lose HP while this is in your hand.

cards.name: Hemogenesis+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage. Gain 8 Block. Heal 8 HP. Exhaust.
Upgrade each time you lose HP while this is in your hand.

cards.name: Many Hands
cards.description:
Add X copies of Undeath's Touch to your hand.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Many Hands+
cards.description:
Add X copies of Undeath's Touch to your hand.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Hidden Blade
cards.description: Add a Shiv to your hand and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Hidden Blade+
cards.description: Add a Shiv to your hand and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Draining Mist
cards.description:
Apply 3 Necrotic Poison and 1 Languid to a random enemy 2 times.
Apply -1 Strength to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Draining Mist+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Necrotic Poison and 1 Languid to a random enemy 3 times.
Apply -2 Strength to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Exploit Weakness
cards.description:
Apply Languid equal to target's Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Exploit Weakness+
cards.description:
Apply Languid equal to target's Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fluid Movement
cards.description: Keep up to 5 Block between rounds.

cards.name: Fluid Movement+
cards.description: Keep up to 8 Block between rounds.

cards.name: Poison Smokescreen
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply that much Poison randomly split among all enemies.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Poison Smokescreen+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply that much Poison randomly split among all enemies.

cards.name: Scrap Shanks
cards.description: Each time you discard a card during your turn, add 1 Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Scrap Shanks+
cards.description: Each time you discard a card during your turn, add 1 Upgraded Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Shiv Toss
cards.description:
Discard all Shivs in your hand.
Your Shivs deal 1 extra damage this combat for each one discarded.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Shiv Toss+
cards.description:
Discard all Shivs in your hand.
Your Shivs deal 1 extra damage this combat for each one discarded.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Retain.

cards.name: Sneak Up
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Discard all Attacks in your hand.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Innate.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Sneak Up+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Discard all Attacks in your hand.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Innate.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Speed Training
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Discard a random card.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Speed Training+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Discard a random card.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: The Works
cards.description:
For every 3 cards you draw this turn, gain [E] and deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
Becomes Unplayable until end of round.

cards.name: The Works+
cards.description:
For every 3 cards you draw this turn, gain [E] and deal 9 damage to a random enemy.
Becomes Unplayable until end of round.

cards.name: Toxin Wave
cards.description: Apply 3 Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Toxin Wave+
cards.description: Apply 4 Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Tripwire
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
At the start of your next turn, Stun a random enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tripwire+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
At the start of your next turn, Stun a random enemy and draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Atom Bomb
cards.description:
Deal 60 damage.
Apply 4 Poison to ALL fighters.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Atom Bomb+
cards.description:
Deal 75 damage.
Apply 4 Poison to ALL fighters.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bag of Tricks
cards.description:
Choose X:
Apply !replay:M+1! Poison,
add !replay:M-1! shivs to your hand,
gain 7 block, draw !replay:M-2! cards,
or gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Bag of Tricks+
cards.description:
Choose X:
Apply !replay:M+1! Poison,
add !replay:M-1! shivs to your hand,
gain 10 block, draw !replay:M-2! cards,
or gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: From All Sides
cards.description: Apply 1 Weak and deal 3 damage to a random enemy 2X + 1 times.

cards.name: From All Sides+
cards.description: Apply 1 Weak and deal 4 damage to a random enemy 2X + 1 times.

cards.name: Necrosis
cards.description:
Convert all Poison on all enemies to Necrotic Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Necrosis+
cards.description:
Enemy loses all Poison. Apply Necrotic Poison equal to the amount lost to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poison Darts
cards.description:
Apply 3 Necrotic Poison X times.
Apply X Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Poison Darts+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Necrotic Poison X times.
Apply X Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Crystal Conduit
cards.description: Channel 1 Crystal.

cards.name: Crystal Conduit+
cards.description:
Channel 1 Crystal.
Channel 1 random orb.

cards.name: Panic Button
cards.description:
Evoke all your orbs.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.
Retain.

cards.name: Panic Button+
cards.description:
Evoke all your orbs.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.
Retain.

cards.name: Calculation Training
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus.
Add 1 Dazed to your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Calculation Training+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Startup: add 1 Dazed to your discard pile.

cards.name: Claw Rake
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.
Grave. Counts as Claw.
Startup: if your deck has no normal Claw cards, add one to your draw pile.

cards.name: Claw Rake+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Grave. Counts as Claw.
Startup: if your deck has no normal Claw cards, add one to your draw pile.

cards.name: Crystallizer
cards.description:
Crystal orbs give 2 additional Focus to adjacent orbs.
At the end of your turn, if more than half your orb slots are empty, Channel 1 Crystal.

cards.name: Crystallizer+
cards.description:
Innate.
Crystal orbs give 2 additional Focus to adjacent orbs.
At the end of your turn, if more than half your orb slots are empty, Channel 1 Crystal.

cards.name: Empty Bin
cards.description: At the end of your turn, Exhaust all Common cards in your hand, and gain 4 Block for each.

cards.name: Empty Bin+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust all Common cards in your hand, and gain 5 Block for each.

cards.name: FIFO Queue
cards.description: Gain 4 Orb Slots.

cards.name: FIFO Queue+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 4 Orb Slots.

cards.name: Reflective Lens
cards.description:
Channel 1 Glass.
Glass orbs give Reflection as a passive ability.

cards.name: Reflective Lens+
cards.description:
Channel 1 Glass.
Glass orbs give Reflection as a passive ability.

cards.name: Repulse
cards.description:
Gain 1 Reflection.
Shuffle 1 Backfire into your discard pile.

cards.name: Repulse+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Reflection.
Shuffle 1 Backfire into your discard pile.

cards.name: Reroute Power
cards.description:
Swap your Strength and Focus.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Reroute Power+
cards.description:
Swap your Strength and Focus.
Draw 1 card.
Retain.

cards.name: Solid Light Projector
cards.description:
Gain 2 Shielding for every 5 cards in your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Solid Light Projector+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Shielding for every 3 cards in your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Sort
cards.description: Shuffle all Rare OR non-Status cards in your discard pile back into your draw pile. Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Sort+
cards.description:
Shuffle all Rare OR non-Status cards in your discard pile back into your draw pile. Draw 2 cards.
Retain.

cards.name: System Scan
cards.description: The next 2 Status cards you draw Exhaust and draw 1 card when drawn.

cards.name: System Scan+
cards.description: The next 3 Status cards you draw Exhaust and draw 1 card when drawn.

cards.name: Time Bomb
cards.description:
Gain 2 Orb Slots.
Channel 2 Glass.
Channel 1 Dark and trigger its passive 2 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Time Bomb+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Orb Slots.
Channel 2 Glass.
Channel 1 Dark and trigger its passive 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fabricate Wheel
cards.description:
Obtain a Prayer Wheel relic.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Fabricate Wheel+
cards.description:
Obtain a Prayer Wheel relic.
You may choose 1 of 3 random Rare cards to permanently add to your deck.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Mirror Shield
cards.description:
Channel 1 Crystal.
Channel 1 Frost.
Gain 5 Block.
Gain 1 Reflection.

cards.name: Mirror Shield+
cards.description:
Channel 1 Crystal.
Channel 1 Frost.
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 2 Reflection.

cards.name: Omega Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies 4 times.
Add 2 Backfires to your discard pile.

cards.name: Omega Cannon+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies 5 times.
Add 2 Backfires to your discard pile.

cards.name: RNG
cards.description: Channel X random orbs.

cards.name: RNG+
cards.description: Channel (X+1) random orbs.

cards.name: Armaments MK-II
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Can Mega-Upgrade cards.

cards.name: Armaments MK-II-B
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
If the card is already Upgraded, Enhance it instead.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Armaments MK-II-B+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.
Enhances cards that are already Upgraded.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Armaments MK-III
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.
Can Mega-Upgrade cards.

cards.name: Captain's Orders
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
If you have <1 Strength, gain 1 Strength.
If you have <1 Potency, gain 1 Potency.

cards.name: Captain's Orders+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
If you have <1 Strength, gain 1 Strength.
If you have <1 Potency, gain 1 Potency.

cards.name: Dark Echo
cards.description: Deal 42 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Dark Echo+
cards.description: Deal 56 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Drag to Hell
cards.description:
Apply 5 Drowning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Drag to Hell+
cards.description:
Apply 9 Drowning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Firewall
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Each time you block incoming damage this round, Channel 1 Hellfire.

cards.name: Firewall+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Each time you block incoming damage this round, Channel 1 Hellfire.

cards.name: Forest Fishers
cards.description: Choose: Gain 2 Dexterity, or heal 10 HP.

cards.name: Forest Fishers+
cards.description: Choose: Gain 3 Dexterity, or heal 10 HP.

cards.name: Forest Treasure
cards.description: Gain 2 random Relic effects.

cards.name: Forest Treasure+
cards.description: Gain 3 random Relic effects.

cards.name: Ghost Defend
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Fetch
cards.description:
Choose a basic card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Fetch+
cards.description:
Choose a basic card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Swipe
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ghost Swipe+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Grinning Jar
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
You may not play another Grinning Jar this turn.

cards.name: Grinning Jar+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Living Lantern
cards.description:
Heal 7 HP.
If you are below 50% max HP, gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Living Lantern+
cards.description:
Heal 12 HP.
If you are below 50% max HP, gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Lost Forever
cards.description:
Apply to an enemy.
For every 15 health they lose, they gain 1 Languid.

cards.name: Lost Forever+
cards.description:
Apply to an enemy.
For every 12 health they lose, they gain 1 Languid.

cards.name: Many Paths
cards.description:
Discard 1 card.
Fetch !replay:M+1! cards.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Many Paths+
cards.description:
Discard 2 card.
Fetch !replay:M+1! cards.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Overheat Weapons
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus if you have <0, Lose 1 Focus if you have >0.
Channel 1 Hellfire.
Add 1 Backfire to your discard pile.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Overheat Weapons+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus if you have <0, Lose 1 Focus if you have >0.
Channel 1 Hellfire.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ritual Component
cards.description: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ritual Component+
cards.description: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Scorching Beam
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Channel 1 Hellfire.

cards.name: Scorching Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
Channel 2 Hellfire.

cards.name: Six Feet Under
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 6 times.
Gain 2 Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Six Feet Under+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 6 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Improvise
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 1 less.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Improvise+
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 random cards to upgrade and add to your hand.
It costs 1 less.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Might
cards.description:
For X turns, your Attacks deal 25% more damage.
Refund !stslib:refund!.

cards.name: Might+
cards.description:
For X turns, your Attacks deal 25% more damage.
Refund !stslib:refund!.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Gain 2 Reflection if target intends to attack.
Ethereal.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Parry+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 2 Reflection if target intends to attack.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Private Reserves
cards.description:
Gain [E].
Exhaust.
Retain.

cards.name: Private Reserves+
cards.description:
Gain [E].
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.
Retain.

cards.name: Specialist
cards.description:
Lose 1 Focus.
All non-attack damage you deal is increased by 2.

cards.name: Specialist+
cards.description:
Lose 1 Focus.
Innate.
All non-attack damage you deal is increased by 2.

cards.name: Sssshield
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 6 Shielding for each [E] this cost.
Snecko.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sssshield+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 6 Shielding for each [E] this cost.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Snecko.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sssstrike
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage, plus an additional 4 for each [E] this cost.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Snecko.

cards.name: Sssstrike+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage, plus an additional 5 for each [E] this cost.
Refund !stslib:refund!.
Snecko.

cards.name: Survey Options
cards.description:
Draw X.
Refund !stslib:refund!.

cards.name: Survey Options+
cards.description:
Draw X.
Refund !stslib:refund!.

cards.name: Trickstab
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 times.
Affected by block modifiers.

cards.name: Trickstab+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
Affected by block modifiers.

cards.name: Uncanny Aura
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Grave.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity for each other Unplayable card in your hand.

cards.name: Uncanny Aura+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Grave.
At the end of your turn, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity for each other Unplayable card in your hand.

cards.name: Awakened One Ritual
cards.description: Add 3 πRitual Components to your draw and discard piles. If 5 are ever in your hand at once, they become 42 damage Attacks.

cards.name: Awakened One Ritual+
cards.description: Add 4 πRitual Components to your draw and discard piles. If 5 are ever in your hand at once, they become 42 damage Attacks.

cards.name: Brewmaster
cards.description: Obtain a random potion at the start of each round.

cards.name: Brewmaster+
cards.description: Obtain a random potion at the start of each round.

cards.name: Dark Deal
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: Choose 1 of 2 random Black cards to add to your draw pile.

cards.name: Dark Deal+
cards.description:
Unplayable. Grave.
Startup: Choose 1 of 3 random Black cards to add to your draw pile.

cards.name: Midas Touch
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.
Add a random Rare card to your hand for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Midas Touch+
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.
Add a random Upgraded Rare card to your hand for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Necrogeddon
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the number of cards you've Exhausted this combat.
Grave.

cards.name: Necrogeddon+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the number of cards you've Exhausted this combat to ALL enemies.
Grave.

cards.name: Poisoned Strike
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Affected by damage modifiers.

cards.name: Poisoned Strike+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Poison.
Affected by damage modifiers.

cards.name: The Ultimate Defense
cards.description:
Gain 1 Artifact.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 5 Plated Armor.
Gain 5 Shielding.

cards.name: The Ultimate Defense+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Artifact.
Gain 2 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Gain 5 Plated Armor.
Gain 8 Shielding.

cards.name: Abe's Revenge
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, gain 2 Frail.
Ethereal.
Soulbound.

cards.name: Amnesia
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand.

cards.name: Common Cold
cards.description: Sneeze!

cards.name: Delirium
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, gain Confusion for 1 round.

cards.name: Depression
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, gain 2 Languid and draw a card.

cards.name: Doomed
cards.description:
Die.
Fleeting.
Ethereal.
Grave.

cards.name: Faulty Equipment
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Soulbound.

cards.name: Hallucinations
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, add 1 random card to your draw pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: I.O.U.
cards.description:
Costs 100 gold to play.
Fleeting.
Soulbound.

cards.name: Looming Evil
cards.description:
Can be played for 3 Energy to Exhaust.
At the end of your turn, shuffle a curse into your draw pile and reduce cost.

cards.name: Over-Encumbered
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you draw this, add 3 Dazed to your hand and draw a card.

cards.name: Restless Dread
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Draw 1 card.
Add 3 random Curses to your discard pile.
Exhaust.
Grave.

cards.name: Sickly
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, lose 3 Block.

cards.name: Splinters
cards.description:
Take 2 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Startup: add a copy of this to your draw pile.

cards.name: Spreading Infection
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, duplicate all other Status and Curse cards in your hand.

cards.name: Untested Repairs
cards.description: Fleeting.

cards.name: Vengeful Threat
cards.description:
Grave.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.
Switches to Imminent Threat.

cards.name: Voices
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Ethereal.
Startup: Add 2 copies of this card to your discard pile.

cards.name: Wavering Confidence
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Self-Retaining.
At the end of your turn, Switches to Delayed Remorse.

Snecko. Purge.
???????

Snecko. Purge.
???????

cards.name: Black Plague
cards.description:
Draw !replay:M/2u! cards.
Apply 4 Poison.
Apply 4 Necrotic Poison.
Apply 4 Languid.
Apply 4 Decrepit.
Split this card in half.

cards.name: Black Plague+
cards.description:
Draw !replay:M/2u! cards.
Apply 6 Poison.
Apply 6 Necrotic Poison.
Apply 6 Languid.
Apply 6 Decrepit.
Split this card in half.

cards.name: Book of Names
cards.description:
Gain Slime/Orb slots until you have 3.
Add a random Spire Boss card to your hand at the start of your next 3 turns.
After 3 turns, shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Book of Names+
cards.description:
Gain Slime/Orb slots until you have 4.
Add a random Spire Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !replay:M+1! turns.
After 4 turns, shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Chaos Vortex
cards.description:
Gain 15 Shielding.
Confuse all enemies.
1 card you draw each turn has its stats and effects scrambled.

cards.name: Chaos Vortex+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Shielding.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Confuse all enemies.
1 card you draw each turn has its stats and effects scrambled.

cards.name: Echoes of Time
cards.description:
Fetch 3 cards you've Exhausted this combat.
Grave.
Purge.

cards.name: Echoes of Time+
cards.description:
Fetch 5 cards you've Exhausted this combat.
Grave.
Purge.

cards.name: Fractal Strike
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Add a new Fractal πStrike to your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Fractal Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Add a new Fractal πStrike to your discard pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Haul
cards.description:
Draw your entire draw pile.
You cannot draw any more cards this turn.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Haul+
cards.description:
Draw your entire draw pile.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

relics.name: Burning Sludge
relics.description:
At the end of combat, for each Spawned slime, heal 2 HP.
Certain Red cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Your entire being burns with rage.

relics.name: Chord Ring
relics.description:
Draw 2 additional cards on the first turn of combat.
Certain Green cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: This ring is composed of a series of rotating metal bands, each sporting carvings of notes.

relics.name: Cloak of the Snake
relics.description:
Draw 2 additional cards on the first turn of combat.
Certain Green cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Draping it over your shoulders, you hear a faint hissing sound where the clinking of knives once was.

relics.name: Ignis Sanguine
relics.description:
Each time you deal 20 damage in a single turn, gain 2 Ignis.
Heal 3 HP at the end of combat.
Certain Red cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Where the broken gem once was, only the intense heat of a forge remains.

relics.name: Iron Core
relics.description:
At the start of combat, gain 2 orb slots if you have none, or Channel 1 Hellfire otherwise.
Certain Red and Blue cards can appear in future card reward screens.
relics.flavorText: Powered by unceasing flames and rage.

relics.name: Larethian Blood
relics.description:
At the start of combat, gain 6 Temporary HP.
Certain Red cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Blood of the ancient god Corellon Larethian.

relics.name: Mercury Core
relics.description:
At the start of combat, Replicate 1 Mercury.
Certain Blue cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: The liquid inside sloshes around, ready to fulfill its timely purpose.

relics.name: Music Box
relics.description:
At the start of combat, gain 3 orb slots and bard:Queue a [OrbNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
Certain Blue cards can now be obtained.

relics.name: Ring of the Sea Serpent
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, add 2 Shivs to your hand.
Certain Green cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Supposedly the remains of a great sea creature from times long past.

relics.name: Ring of the Slime
relics.description:
Draw 2 additional cards on the first turn of combat.
Certain Green cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: This part of you acts on its own, never completely split, and never completely merged.

relics.name: Scarlet Blood
relics.description:
Each time you gain Strength, gain twice that many Knives.
Certain Red cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: As your rage builds and your senses sharpen, so does your blood.

relics.name: Sea Blood
relics.description:
At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.
Certain Red cards can now be obtained.
relics.flavorText: Your blood becomes merged with the rage of the far-off seas.

relics.name: Sizzling Blood
relics.description:
At the end of combat heal 4 HP.
Gain 4 max HP on pickup.
relics.flavorText: It burns with fire and poison.

relics.name: Antivirus Software
relics.description:
Every time you shuffle your deck, gain 1 Artifact.
When you draw a Status, consumes 1 Artifact to Exhaust it and all other Status cards drawn that turn, drawing 1 card each time.
relics.flavorText: The robotic equivalent to a vaccine.

relics.name: Bandana
relics.description:
Gain 2 Thievery for the first 3 turns of combat.
Synergy - Bloody Idol.
relics.flavorText: The finest article of pick-pocketing attire.

relics.name: Baseball
relics.description: Upon pick up, a random card in your deck becomes free.
relics.flavorText: We all have our favorite player.

relics.name: Funnel
relics.description: At the end of your turn, unused energy is converted to 4 Block each.
relics.flavorText: Use every last drop.

relics.name: Geode
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, trigger the passive effect of all your channeled orbs and Channel 1 Crystal.
relics.flavorText: Break it open!

relics.name: Gremlin Food
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, Upgrade a random card.
relics.flavorText: Some gremlins are known to steal food from people, but in return grant a favor while the adventurer sleeps.

relics.name: Grinning Jar
relics.description:
Obtain a Skill that draws 2 cards.
Obtain an additional copy for every 12 other cards added to your deck.
relics.flavorText: "I play Grinning Jar, which allows me to draw 2 cards from my deck!"

relics.name: King of Hearts
relics.description: When you lose HP during your turn, gain twice that much block.
relics.flavorText: Traditionally drawn with his sword going through his head, is sometimes known as the Suicide King.

relics.name: Lightbulb
relics.description: If you have any unspent [E] at the end of your turn, draw that many cards at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: How long has it been since you've seen the sun?

relics.name: Mystery Machine
relics.description:
Gains 1 charge each time you enter a ? room.
Loses 1 charge each time you go between two non-? rooms.
Start combat with 1 random Strength or Dexterity for each charge this has.
relics.flavorText: For those who like to wander.

relics.name: Pet Ghost
relics.description:
Add a ghost card to your hand every turn.
Your max hand size is increased by 1.
relics.flavorText: The ghost of a pet once belonging to a knight.

relics.name: Rubber Ducky
relics.description: Each time you play a Power, gain Shielding equal to 3 times its [E] cost.
relics.flavorText: When you squeeze it, it makes noise.

relics.name: Rune of Simplicity
relics.description:
Strikes and Defends can be Upgraded any number of times.
On pick up, Upgrade 2 randomly.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes, things aren't as complicated as they appear.

relics.name: Spearhead
relics.description: At the end of your turn, all enemies lose HP equal to their Vulnerable.

relics.name: Tag Bag
relics.description:
Shops have all 3 kinds of sale tags.
Sale tags can appear on colorless cards.
On-sale cards are cheaper.
relics.flavorText: A colorful collection.

relics.name: Tiger Marble
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, add a random card which Exhausts to your hand.
It costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Eye of the Tiger

relics.name: Wax Seal
relics.description:
Relics in shops cost 20% less.
Right click at a shop to activate:
Borrow 100 gold. Add a Curse to your deck until you pay it back.
relics.flavorText: The kind used to close envelopes, not the sea creature.

relics.name: Accelerometer
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate. Usable once per combat.
Decrease your turn-based Debuffs by 1.
Increase all enemy turn-based Debuffs by 1.
relics.flavorText: Time over Time.

relics.name: Basket of Snakes
relics.description: Every 5th Attack you play applies 2 Necrotic Poison each time it deals unblocked damage.
relics.flavorText: Don't worry; they won't bite. At least, they won't bite you.

relics.name: Bottled Eggs
relics.description:
On pick up, choose a card.
All copies of that card you have are Upgraded.
All future copies of that card you obtain are Upgraded.

relics.name: Bottled Flurry
relics.description:
On pick up, choose a card.
You Retain that card at the end of your turn.
If the card would Exhaust due to being Ethereal, it is discarded instead.
relics.flavorText: It's like a snowglobe!

relics.name: Bottled Geyser
relics.description:
On pick up, choose a card.
Each time you shuffle your deck, that card is placed on the top.
relics.flavorText: FWOOOOOOSH!

relics.name: Bottled Snecko
relics.description:
On pick up, you may choose a card.
It gains Snecko.
If you do not choose a card, you may choose one at a later rest site as a free action.
relics.flavorText: Despite how large the adults are, baby sneckos are small enough to fit in your pocket - and they're cute!

relics.name: Carrot
relics.description: You gain 3 Focus at the start of combat. You lose 1 Focus over the next 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Filled with power.

relics.name: Chameleon Ring
relics.description:
Your potions are more potent.
You can now Brew at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: A ring that glimmers with slowly shifting colors.

relics.name: Divine Protection
relics.description: Gain 8 Temporary HP at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: The strength to carry on in times of trial.

relics.name: Garlic
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 3 Languid to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Taking a whiff may cause your eyes to tear up.

relics.name: Golden Egg
relics.description:
Whenever you add a Rare card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
Whenever you purchase a card from the merchant, it is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Not approved by the FDA.

relics.name: Hand Mirror
relics.description: Whenever you gain Vulnerable or Weakened, it is also applied to the enemy that sent it.
relics.flavorText: You can see yourself through the glass. The good and the bad.

relics.name: Iron Hammer
relics.description: During the first turn, drawing a card upgrades it.
relics.flavorText: A handy - and heavy - tool.

relics.name: Ninjato
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Stab stab stab

relics.name: Onion Ring
relics.description:
You gain 3 Strength at the start of each combat.
You lose 1 Strength over the next 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: The onion is encased in a deep-fried breading.

relics.name: Quantum Egg
relics.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, it is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Tastes like [REDACTED].

relics.name: Ringing Soul
relics.description: Once per room, when you add a card to your deck, gain 3 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: How obnoxious!

relics.name: Shallot
relics.description:
You gain 3 Dexterity and Metallicize at the start of each combat.
You lose 1 Dexterity and Metallicize over the next 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: It's a shallot. Not a whole lot to say about it.

relics.name: Snack Pack
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: Always come prepared with a snack.

relics.name: Solar Panel
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal 2 HP for each of your active Lightning orbs.
relics.flavorText: Clean, renewable power.

relics.name: Wasp Nest
relics.description: Each time you lose HP in combat, gain 2 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Like a bee nest, but more evil.

relics.name: Another Sword
relics.description:
The first card containing "strike" you play each round is played twice.
Takes 1 additional turn to recharge for each [R] spent on the card.
relics.flavorText: A second sword. You have two now.

relics.name: Arrowhead
relics.description: You may Upgrade 2 cards whenever you smith.
relics.flavorText: The first thing you ever forged.

relics.name: Byrd Skull
relics.description: Your Innate cards have Refund 1 and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The skull of a fallen Byrd. ...Get it? Fallen?

relics.name: Counterbalance
relics.description: During boss and elite fights enemy Strength gain, Block gain, and Healing is reduced by half.
relics.flavorText: For every strength, there is a weakness.

relics.name: Durian
relics.description:
Whenever you gain a Debuff, gain Temporary HP equal to the amount.
At the start of your turn, reduce your turn-based Debuffs to 2.
On pickup, increase your max HP by 5.
relics.flavorText: Smells awful, tastes great.

relics.name: Kaleidoscope
relics.description: When you play 3 cards that give Block in a single turn, gain 1 Reflection.
relics.flavorText: Colors, distorts, and reflects light.

relics.name: Multitool
relics.description: You have 2 additional options at rest sites, chosen randomly.

relics.name: Pocket Polymer
relics.description: You can now Transform a card at rest sites as a free action.
relics.flavorText: The power of SCIENCE! Probably.

relics.name: Pondfish Scales
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill that does not give Block, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: Scales sometimes held by those who have bested Captain Abe in battle.

relics.name: Towering Pillar of Hats
relics.description:
Max hand size increased by 2.
At the end of your turn, Retain the right-most cards in your hand. Retains 1 card for every 3 in your hand.
relics.flavorText: "Tarnish notte the majesty of my TOWER of HATS!"

relics.name: Vampiric Spirits
relics.description: On the first turn of combat, 25% of all unblocked Attack damage you deal is returned as health.
relics.flavorText: A fondness for shadows, a thirst for blood; traits held by rogues and vampires alike.

relics.name: Blank Codex
relics.description: At the start of combat and each time you shuffle your deck, you may choose 1 of 3 random Black cards to add to your discard pile. If you do, also add a random Curse to your discard pile.
relics.flavorText: Full of empty. Full of evil.

relics.name: Library Looter
relics.description:
Custom Run Modifer
Each time you open a non-boss chest, choose 1 of 15 cards to obtain.
relics.flavorText: aight listen i KNOW its bad form to implement a custom run mod with a relic but y'know what sometimes you just gotta look urself in the mirror and ask "do i really feel like dealing with patching shit when relics have a perfectly good hook for opening chests" and sometimes the answer is no.

relics.name: Ring of Addiction
relics.description:
On pick up, obtain 3 potions and 2 random relics with effects related to potions.
Each time you go through 3 rooms without using a potion, lose 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Good in abundance breeds evil.

relics.name: Ring of Collecting
relics.description:
Non-boss chests contain a random ring relic in addition to thier normal contents.
Shops will sometimes sell ring relics.
relics.flavorText: A full set is greater than the sum of its parts, yet not nessearily worth the cost.

relics.name: Ring of Exchange
relics.description:
Shop relics can sometimes appear in boss chests.
Boss relics can sometimes appear in shops.
relics.flavorText: You never know the value of what you have until it is lost.

relics.name: Ring of Fangs
relics.description:
At the start of combat lose 3 Strength.
Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 1 Poison.
relics.flavorText: The fangs poke into the wearer, making wielding weapons difficult.

relics.name: Ring of Fury
relics.description: At the start of combat gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A cursed ring that heightens both senses and senselessness.

relics.name: Ring of Greed
relics.description:
On pick up, obtain 50 gold and 2 random relics with effects related to gold or shops.
For every 150 gold you obtain, add 1 random Curse to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Great wealth often rides with great dispair.

relics.name: Ring of Hypnosis
relics.description: All enemies start with 5 Confusion.
relics.flavorText: The strange colors and reflected lights draw the mind down a wandering path.

relics.name: Ring of Misfortune
relics.description:
At the start of combat add a random Curse to your discard pile.
Each time you draw a Curse, gain [E] and 3 Temporary HP.
Each time you draw a Status, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Weary wear.

relics.name: Ring of Panic
relics.description:
At the start of combat you become Confused for 3 turns.
Gain [E] [E] at the start of rounds 1 and 2.
Gain [E] at the start of round 3.
relics.flavorText: Fear serves its purpose.

relics.name: Ring of Peace
relics.description: At the start of combat apply 3 Weak to ALL fighters and gain 1 Buffer
relics.flavorText: Peace never lasts long in the Spire.

relics.name: Ring of Searing
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, ALL enemies above 50% Max HP lose 10% of their current HP.
At the end of each round, if you are above 75% Max HP, lose 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: A cursed ring that burns everything around it to ash.

relics.name: Ring of Shattering
relics.description: At the start of combat you gain 3 Focus and lose 2 Orb Slots.
relics.flavorText: What is broken can be made better for it.

relics.name: Abe's Treasure
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Start combat with Drowning.
On pick up, add a copy of Abe's Revenge to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Cursed?

relics.name: Bronze Core
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Each combat includes a Bronze Orb minion that won't attack, but will put cards into stasis until killed.
relics.flavorText: Even now, it acts to defend the spire.

relics.name: Chewing Gum
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Every time you shuffle your deck, add 3 Slimed to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Sticky and sweet.

relics.name: Dimensional Glitch
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
All non-attack damage you deal is reduced to half, rounding down.
All non-attack damage you recieve is increased by half, rounding up.
All in-combat healing you recieve is reduced to half, rounding up.
relics.flavorText: UPDATE BODY TEXT

relics.name: Electric Blood
relics.description:
Gain [R] [R] at the start of each turn.
Lose 1 HP for every [R] you use, excluding the first 2 used each turn.
relics.flavorText: You feel your body surging with power. It hurts.

relics.name: Grab Bag
relics.description:
Choose 1 Energy Boss Relic and 1 Non-Energy Boss Relic to obtain.
Both choices will be out of 3 random relics, and cannot be skipped.
relics.flavorText: Trinkets and treats. What will you get?

relics.name: Hamster Wheel
relics.description:
Gain [E] each time you draw a card.
Drawing a card increases its cost by 1 for the turn.
At the start of combat, add a random Curse to your draw pile for each X-cost card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Keep on running.

relics.name: Honey Jar
relics.description:
Draw 1 more card each turn.
Retain up to 1 card each turn.
On pick up, gain 1 extra potion slot.
You cannot skip rewards.
relics.flavorText: Delicious!

relics.name: Kintsugi
relics.description:
Remove 5 cards from your deck.
Choose 2 Curses to obtain.
(Attempting to remove Curses with the first effect Transforms them instead).
relics.flavorText: What is broken can be made better.

relics.name: Ooze Armor
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Gain 4 Malleable and -3 Slow at the start of combat
relics.flavorText: Armor with the flexibility and toughness of living slime.

relics.name: Ring of Chaos
relics.description: Some card rewards have randomly altered stats and effects.
relics.flavorText: A ring with wild and unpredictable magic effects.

relics.name: Sealed Pack
relics.description:
Choose a Basic card to obtain.
Choose a Rare card to obtain.
Choose a Colorless card to obtain.
Choose a Black card to obtain.
Choose a Curse to obtain.
Curse cannot be skipped, and becomes Soulbound.
relics.flavorText: A standard 5-card booster pack. Maybe you'll get lucky?

relics.name: Shrinking Draught
relics.description:
Lose [E] and draw 2 cards at the start of your turn.
Start each combat with 4 Dexterity.
If you play at least 6 cards in a single turn, gain [E] at the start of your next turn.
On pick up, remove 3 cards from your deck and lose 25% Max HP.
Synergy - Tiny House
relics.flavorText: The label reads "Drink me."

relics.name: Snecko Heart
relics.description:
Start combat Confused.
Confusion can never increase the cost of a card by more than 1.
The first card you draw each turn always costs 0.
relics.flavorText: The preserved heart of a fallen Snecko.

relics.name: Snecko Scales
relics.description:
Draw 3 additional cards each turn.
When you play a card that costs more than 0 energy, discard a card.
relics.flavorText: Scales from a Snecko that shed its skin. They seem to reflect lights with shimmering colors.

relics.name: Sweet Flower
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Less map information.
relics.flavorText: The sickly sweet scent of this flower makes you feel dizzy...

relics.name: Wanted Poster
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
For every 100 gold below 500 you have, enemies start with a random buff.
Gain 100 gold on pick up.
relics.flavorText: Gold and blood: weighed on the same scale.

relics.name: Bargain Bundle
relics.description: When you purchase this relic, the cost of the cards, potions, and card removal service in the same shop are reduced by 100 gold.
relics.flavorText: What a deal!

relics.name: Cursed Coin
relics.description: On pickup, obtain 150 gold and a random Curse.
relics.flavorText: A cursed coin that brings misfortune to its owner. The only way to get rid of it is to sell it.

relics.name: Energy Ball
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate. Usable once per combat.
Consumes unspent [E] at the end of your turn to gain charges, up to 5 max.
Using spends 3 charges to play your character's Form Power.
relics.flavorText: Smashing!

relics.name: Frozen Program
relics.description: Each time you Evoke Frost, gain 1 Reflection.
relics.flavorText: FROST.exe has stopped responding.

relics.name: Guide Book
relics.description:
On pickup, Upgrades 2 cards randomly.
Prioritizes rarer cards.
relics.flavorText: A book detailing "tourist spots" in the spire. It seems to have been written by the shop merchant.

relics.name: Lucky Slots
relics.description:
Whenever a fighter loses exactly 7 HP, gain Critical.
If this triggers 3 times in one combat, gain 7 gold.
relics.flavorText: Spin to win!

relics.name: Raider's Mask
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if a Dark orb has more stored damage than the HP of the lowest-health enemy, it is Evoked.
relics.flavorText: Leave no survivors.

relics.name: Shop Pack
relics.description:
Choose 3 Colorless cards to obtain.
Guaranteed to get at least 1 Rare card!
relics.flavorText: A cheap 3-card booster pack. Probably rigged by the merchant.

potions.name: Elixir
potions.description: Exhaust ALL Status and Curse cards.

potions.name: Milkshake
potions.description: You can retain up to 5 Energy between turns until the end of combat.

potions.name: Toxic Potion
potions.description: Apply 5 Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies.

potions.name: Venom Potion
potions.description: Apply 1 Poison to enemies when you damage them. Lose 1 Strength.

potions.name: Cursed Concoction
potions.description:
Gain 3 Strength and 2 Dexterity.
Add a random Curse to your draw and discard piles.

keywords.name: Backfire
keywords.description:
Status: Deals 4 damage and Exhausts at the end of your turn.
Affected by your own damage modifiers.

keywords.name: Crystal
keywords.description:
Orb: Gives adjacent orbs +2 Focus. When Evoked, if you have fewer than 3 orb slots, gain an orb slot.
Passive effect is not affected by Focus.

keywords.name: Decrepit
keywords.description:
Fighters afflicted by Decrepit suffer 1 extra damage from attacks for each stack.
Each turn Decrepit is decreased by 1.

keywords.name: Glass
keywords.description: Orb: No Passive effect. When Evoked while you have more than 3 orb slots, consumes your leftmost orb slot and Evokes the occupying orb.

keywords.name: Hellfire
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of your turn, gain +2 Strength until the end of your turn.
When Evoked, applies 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Languid
keywords.description:
Fighters with Languid deal 1 less Attack damage per stack.
Is reduced by 1 at the end of each turn.
